alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 3:01PM EDT until May 19 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along Bogue Banks beaches, Bogue Sound, the Newport and White Oak Rivers, areas along the lower Neuse River, Pamlico, Core and Back Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 18/11 PM 5.2 -0.6 1.1 1 Minor 19/11 AM 3.8 -2.0 1.2 1 None 20/12 AM 4.7 -1.1 0.8 1 None 20/12 PM 3.6 -2.2 1.1 1 None 21/01 AM 4.6 -1.2 0.9 1 None 21/01 PM 3.6 -2.2 1.1 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
